title: Grappling with new normal as debt levels skyrocket, stalling return to average interest rates
description:
Quick Take A closer look at the question, “When are interest rates returning to normal?” reveals an intriguing aspect of economic dynamics. The Bank of England (BOE) still hovers approximately 50 basis points (bps) from the average interest rate levels since 1970. However, the intervening years have witnessed stark shifts in the economic landscape. According […]

title: Grayscale petitions SEC to convert GBTC into a spot Bitcoin ETF
description: In a significant move that could reshape the cryptocurrency landscape, Grayscale Investments, the world’s largest digital asset manager, has formally submitted a letter to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), urging the regulatory body to greenlight its proposal to convert its Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) into a spot Bitcoin Exchange-Traded Fund (ETF). This formal ... Read more

title: Coinbase fills the void in the crypto lending space with new services
description: Coinbase Global, the popular cryptocurrency exchange, is seizing a significant opportunity in the volatile crypto lending market. With several major players like BlockFi and Genesis Global exiting the market following financial distress, Coinbase has announced its entry into the lending space for institutional investors in the United States. A new service for institutional lending On ... Read more

title: 1inch acquires $10m in ETH, ADA and QUBE potentially next in line
description: InQubeta (QUBE) and Cardano (ADA) are being explored after 1inch fund recently acquired $10 million of Ethereum (ETH)

title: Ethereum Wallet MetaMask Makes Waves: New Feature Allows Users to Sell ETH for Fiat
description: MetaMask allows users to exchange digital assets for fiat currency and transfer them to banks or PayPal accounts. The current service is available in the US, UK, and select European regions. MetaMask cryptocurrency wallet users can now exchange their digital assets for fiat currency and transfer it to either a bank or a PayPal account. [...]

title: Solana and XRP Soar As Ripple Celebrates SEC Victory, Pomerdoge Sets New Milestone
description: After weeks of trading sideways, the cryptocurrency market is back in bullish territory following Ripple’s celebrated victory against the SEC. title: Cardano’s ADA is Set For a Potential Bull Run: Technical Analyst
description:
Crypto technical analyst CryptoBusy thinks Cardano’s current price situation sets it up for a potential bull run. According to CryptoBusy, ADA has formed a large falling wedge from an all-time high (ATH) down to its current price.
